plot: The story about a man and his plan to save the world. During his State of the Worldwide Union Address, he identifies global problems, then reveals his solutions. The world, however, may not be listening.
title: Commander in Chief
plot_es: The story about a man and his plan to save the world. During his State of the Worldwide Union Address, he identifies global problems, then reveals his solutions. The world, however, may not be listening.
plot_en: The story about a man and his plan to save the world. During his State of the Worldwide Union Address, he identifies global problems, then reveals his solutions. The world, however, may not be listening.
